item.title: Google Adsense text ads in Youtube's embedded player?
item.description: Today while searching for photography tutorials, i landed up on Cameratown's tutorial page. Surprisingly, there was a contextual text ad for "Canon Flash Photography" on it. Wonder if it is a new phenomenon, searching on Google would only lead me to articles/posts about the adsense video ad units. Take a look at the image below, it shows the adsense text ad within the video. Is this something Google is doing to monetize Youtube or there is some involvement/share of Cameratown in this case? On refreshing the page I couldn't get the ad back, neither have I seen this ad unit on other embedded youtube videos. Lucky that I took a screen shot in time. If you have any more info on this phenomenon then do let me know.
